      • decodeFromXml

        public java.lang.Object decodeFromXml​(javax.xml.transform.Source attributeElement,
                                      AttributeDescription attributeDescription)
                               throws com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Deserializes custom-type object from xml representation. Usually this method reads text value of the xml node in case of simple object or parses tree of elements for complex object. By the contract the source given is positioned at the node of the object. For DOMSource (as example) it is created around the node.
        Specified by:
        decodeFromXml in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Overrides:
        decodeFromXml in class XmlKeyValueCodec
        Parameters:
        attributeElement - xml attribute to restore the data from
        attributeDescription - attribute description object
        Returns:
        custom-type object value
        Throws:
        com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException - if there is problems with xml data

      • encodeToXml

        public void encodeToXml​(java.lang.Object customTypeObject,
                        javax.xml.transform.Result attributeElement)
                 throws com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Serializes custom-type object to xml. Usually this method adds text value to the attributeElement in case of simple object or tree of elements for complex object. By contract the result accepts xml in appropriate position, so codec can just transform its representation to the Result.
        Specified by:
        encodeToXml in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Overrides:
        encodeToXml in class XmlKeyValueCodec
        Parameters:
        customTypeObject - object to serialize
        attributeElement - xml attribute to store the data in
        Throws:
        com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException - if some codec problems occurred
